description: This file is a React component written in TypeScript, serving as the root layout for a Remix-run based web application. It manages the document structure, link tags, theme, and rendering of child routes.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external resources such as fonts, stylesheets, and icons to be included in the HTML head.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React functional component that renders the HTML structure, including metadata, styles, and the children content.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Root component that renders the current route's outlet.
